sqlMap.select: select SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC from SC_PARAM where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and PARAM_KIND_CODE = #paramKindCode:VARCHAR# and PARAM_CODE = #paramCode:VARCHAR#
select SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC from SC_PARAM where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and PARAM_KIND_CODE = #paramKindCode:VARCHAR#
select SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC from SC_PARAM where SC_PARAM_ID = #scParamId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into SC_PARAM (SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC) values (#scParamId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #paramKind:VARCHAR#, #paramKindCode:VARCHAR#, #paramCode:VARCHAR#, #paramValue:VARCHAR#, #paramDesc:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update SC_PARAM set SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, PARAM_KIND = #paramKind:VARCHAR#, PARAM_KIND_CODE = #paramKindCode:VARCHAR#, PARAM_CODE = #paramCode:VARCHAR#, PARAM_VALUE = #paramValue:VARCHAR#, PARAM_DESC = #paramDesc:VARCHAR# where SC_PARAM_ID = #scParamId:DECIMAL#

update SC_PARAM
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
PARAM_KIND = #paramKind:VARCHAR#
PARAM_KIND_CODE = #paramKindCode:VARCHAR#
PARAM_CODE = #paramCode:VARCHAR#
PARAM_VALUE = #paramValue:VARCHAR#
PARAM_DESC = #paramDesc:VARCHAR#
where SC_PARAM_ID = #scParamId:DECIMAL#
